comment.body:
Nice!

When will Python 3 version be stable and with binary packages?

> [nofish](#comment_328_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I only add version number changes there. The Python3 (0.7.0) version was considered experimental up until recently, but it's mature enough to make it official, so I will add the changes of the list there.

When will "official" 0.7.0 be released? And when 1.0?
